content: Brick reciprocating saw blades Ultimate reciprocating saw blades for cutting brick and blockwork (up to 365 mm thick) ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Specialized carbide reciprocating saw blade engineered to cut best in light concrete and brick Longer lasting – tungsten carbide teeth give these blades the cutting speed and lifespan to get through bigger jobs with fewer blade changes Increased width and thickness – the ideal blade for when you need precise, straight cuts Two lengths available – choosing the right length based on the shape of your workpiece can increase comfort and efficiency Applications Cutting vertical coring brick Cutting Poroton® Cutting solid brick Cutting clinker brick Cutting gypsum and mortar ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Shank: 1/2 in universal shank Teeth per inch: 2 Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Shank | 1/2 in universal shank | Teeth per inch | 2 | Blade features | Long life, Fast cut, Straight cut, Carbide tipped ### ITEMS- 2165376 - Recip. saw blade SPX 13 2 (1) brick - Package Size 1 pc - 2165377 - Recip. saw blade SPX 18 2 (1) brick - Package Size 1 pc
